entry.title: Unscented Beard Balm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rocky Mountain Barber Company
Type: Beard Balm
Price: 95.30 - 1888.00 (9 variants)

Our premium Unscented Beard Balm helps hydrate, condition and add shine to your client's beard while moisturizing the skin beneath it. Our cold-pressed blend helps to prevent itchiness and flaking that can come with a dehydrated face and beard. MSRP: $19.99.

Key Features: Jojoba Oil, Coconut Oil, Bees Wax & Shea Butter.

OVERVIEW

Natural Ingredients to Protect & Hydrate Your Client's Beard & Skin

Our signature Unscented Beard Balm blend is cold pressed and contains natural ingredients such as Grape Seed Oil, Coconut Oil, Jojoba Oil, Argan Oil, Bees Wax and Shea Butter. Your customers will have the peace of mind knowing they're applying an all-natural beard balm to their beard as our commitment to using high quality ingredients ensures their skin and beard get the vitamins, minerals, antioxidants and essential fatty acids they need to keep looking and feeling healthy.

A Blank Sensory Canvas

Our Unscented Beard Balm provides your clients with a completely neutral, unscented base, allowing their cologne, aftershave, or body wash to do the heavy sensory lifting. 

Hand Poured in Small Batches To Ensure Freshness

Proudly crafted in small batches to ensure each balm receives the care and attention to detail your beard deserves. Our small batch approach means your customers receive a premium beard balm made with fresh ingredients to properly hydrate and protect their beard and face. The ultra slim design of our beard balm means it will fit into virtually any pocket, compartment or bag. Our all-aluminum tin with screw-top lid means their balm is well protected and won't accidently open or come in to contact with other products or nearby items.

PRO-TIPS
  • DIRECTIONS FOR BARBERS: For best results, apply to your clients' beard after a trim and rinse, while their beard is still slightly damp and easy to manage. Place onto your fingertips and rub hands together vigorously. Work the balm into your client's beard, beginning at the roots then out to the ends of the hair.
  • AT-HOME DIRECTIONS FOR YOUR CUSTOMERS: For best results, apply to your beard after a shower, while your beard is still slightly damp and easy to manage. Place onto your fingertips and rub hands together vigorously. Work the balm into your beard, beginning at the roots then out to the ends of the hair.
      SPECS
      • Dimensions: 6.3 cm x 6.3 cm x 2.0 cm
      • Weight: 56 g (2 oz)
      INGREDIENTS
      • Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Cera Alba (Yellow) Bees Wax, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Arganil Spinosa (Argan) Kernal Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, d-Alpha Tocopherol, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract.
